attributes.action: White Subtitles with black background for all DVDs for sight impaired peope
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition for colour blind, vision impaired, sight impaired people and deaf people to see the subtitles clearly. Its hard for them to read the white subtitles with no background beacause of colourful backgrounds during the films on DVDs. It would be easier for them to read white subtitles with black background along all DVDs.
